name: Gumbo - Farming
description:
It all started with a small animated cube, that sparked an idea. I turned my cube "Gumbo" into a farmer. Geared with some cash, gumbo set off to become a successful farmer. 

The Game is simple! Use your cash to unlock various vegetables and plant them, some are more valuable then others. Can you unlock them all and have a thriving vegetable garden?

Make sure to collect some water otherwise your plants might not grow.

Let's see!

Controls:

Movement: Left click and hold to guide Gumbo

Interact: Press E

Shop: Q to open and close in the dedicated area.

Light: Press L

NOTE! The sun system is inspired by Animal Crossing and will change based on you local time.

Have Fun!
